00038 template<class VoxelT, class MomentT>
00039 class ZernikeMoments
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     // ---- public typedefs ----
00043     typedef MomentT             T;
00044     typedef vector<T>           T1D;        // vector of scalar type
00045     typedef vector<T1D>         T2D;        // 2D array of scalar type
00046     typedef vector<T2D>         T3D;        // 3D array of scalar type
00047     typedef vector<T3D>         T4D;        // 3D array of scalar type
00048 
00049     typedef std::complex<T>                      ComplexT;       // complex type
00050     typedef vector<vector<vector<ComplexT> > >   ComplexT3D;     // 3D array of complex type
00051     
00052     typedef ComplexCoeff<T>                      ComplexCoeffT;
00053     typedef vector<vector<vector<vector<ComplexCoeffT> > > >    ComplexCoeffT4D;
00054 
00055 
00056 public:
00057     // ---- public member functions ----
00058     ZernikeMoments (int _order, ScaledGeometricalMoments<VoxelT,MomentT>& _gm);
00059     ZernikeMoments ();
00060

00062     void Compute ();
00063 
00064     ComplexT GetMoment (int _n, int _l, int _m);
00065 
00066     // ---- debug functions/arguments ----
00067     void Reconstruct (ComplexT3D&   _grid,                // grid containing the reconstructed function
00068                       T             _xCOG,                // center of gravity 
00069                       T             _yCOG,                  
00070                       T             _zCOG, 
00071                       T             _scale,               // scaling factor to map into unit ball
00072                       int           _minN = 0,            // min value for n freq index 
00073                       int           _maxN = 100,          // min value for n freq index
00074                       int           _minL = 0,            // min value for l freq index
00075                       int           _maxL = 100);         // max value for l freq index
00076 
00077     void NormalizeGridValues (ComplexT3D& _grid);
00078     void CheckOrthonormality (int _n1, int _l1, int _m1, int _n2, int _l2, int _m2);
00079 
00080 private:
00081     // ---- private member functions ----
00082     void ComputeCs ();                      
00083     void ComputeQs ();
00084     void ComputeGCoefficients ();
00085     
00086     // ---- private attributes -----
00087     ComplexCoeffT4D     gCoeffs_;           // coefficients of the geometric moments
00088     ComplexT3D          zernikeMoments_;    // nomen est omen
00089     T3D                 qs_;                // q coefficients (radial polynomial normalization)
00090     T2D                 cs_;                // c coefficients (harmonic polynomial normalization)
00091 
00092     ScaledGeometricalMoments<VoxelT,MomentT> gm_;

00094
